11:00am – 11:45am

Changes to Mass Times

After 6 months of observations, effective April 7, due to low parishioner Mass attendance, our new Sunday Mass Schedule will be: 8 am, 10 am, 12 pm (en Espanol). Effective April 1, we will be returning to a two-priest weekday Mass schedule. The new Weekday Mass Schedule will be: Monday...

Changes to Adoration Times

Beginning Monday, March 4, 2024, we will have Adoration 24/7 with Jesus in the tabernacle. We will have Exposition of the Blessed Sacrament, with Jesus in the monstrance, on Thursdays only, from 8:00 am to 8:00 pm. Please join us each Thursday for Benediction at 7:45 pm. Sign up to...

Saint Peter Church Mobile App

St. Peter Church has entered the mobile age with a new app designed just for St. Peter Parish! The app works on iPhones or Android phones. You can download the link by scanning the QR code. This new app will allow you to access your profile, ministry groups, upcoming events,...

Mobile App Tutorials

St. Peter Catholic Church Mobile App Tutorials Below are links to tutorials on how to utilize the new mobile app. Please contact the Parish Office with any questions, comments or suggestions. How to swap or request a replacement for scheduled serving time...

Scam Alert

Several people are receiving text or email messages that purport to come from Msgr. Kurwicki. These messages are from scammers. Msgr. Kurwicki will NEVER send you a text or email stating that he needs your assistance or gift cards. If you receive a text or email from Msgr. Kurwicki or...

St. Peter Church is now Proto-Cathedral of St. ...

On Thursday, August 10, 2023, Bishop McKnight signed a resolution declaring St. Peter Catholic Church shall now be known as the Proto-Cathedral of St. Peter. Upon the decision of Pope Pius XII in 1956, the State of Missouri was divided into four dioceses, and the Diocese of Jefferson City was...
